chambres.title: Our Rooms
chambres.intro: Discover our five warm, comfortable rooms, lovingly decorated for an unforgettable stay.
chambres.labels: They are labeled with 3 Cl√©s by Cl√©Vacances, a guarantee of quality and comfort.
chambres.animaux: Pets: +‚Ç¨4 in low season ¬∑ +‚Ç¨5 in mid and high season

about_stay.title: About your stay
about_stay.desc:
At L‚ÄôOrangeraie, breakfast is a unique experience: served in the large lounge or in the garden, it invites you to discover a selection of around ten homemade jams, full of authentic flavors, lovingly prepared by your host.
Then enjoy the garden with free access, or take a refreshing break in the fully-equipped summer kitchen.

chambres.tarifs: Rates by season and number of persons - Breakfast included

chambre-marine.resume: Let yourself be carried away by a marine atmosphere, between soft blue and seaside spirit.
chambre-marine.description: Immerse yourself in a briny atmosphere, where soft blue hues evoke the horizon and sea breeze. Every detail reflects the calm of the coast, for a relaxing getaway between sky, sea, and light.

chambre-nature.resume: A room adorned with wrought iron and plant motifs for an elegant touch of nature.
chambre-nature.description: A bright room where wrought iron draws delicate plant patterns, offering a natural and elegant ambiance. The subtle charm of the materials blends with soft tones for a peaceful and refined break.

chambre-bambouseraie.resume: A soothing room with a zen atmosphere, inspired by the softness of bamboo.
chambre-bambouseraie.description: Zen spirit, natural materials, plant touches: this room inspired by bamboo offers a peaceful atmosphere, perfect for recharging in simplicity.

chambre-atelier.resume: A room with a strong character, blending wood, metal, and workshop spirit for an inspired stay.
chambre-atelier.description: A room with a strong character, where raw wood and metal meet in a chic workshop atmosphere. A unique ambiance, inspired by lofts, for a resolutely creative stay.

chambre-coloniale.resume: An elegant communicating suite with an exotic feel, dark wood, natural materials and colonial charm.
chambre-coloniale.description: An elegant room with exotic touches, where dark wood and natural materials create a setting inspired by colonial charm. An invitation to travel in a refined and peaceful setting.

gite.title: Our Cottage
gite.intro1: Nestled in the heart of Elne, our independent cottage welcomes you in a warm and comfortable atmosphere. Perfect for families or longer stays, it offers all the necessary comfort in an authentic setting.
gite.intro2: The cottage includes a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious bedroom, and direct access to the garden.

activities.title: Activities Nearby
activities.intro: Elne and its region offer a wide variety of experiences: nature, culture, gastronomy, and relaxation... Here are some suggestions to enrich your stay at L'Orangeraie.

elne.title: üèõÔ∏è Elne, City of Art and History
elne.desc:
As the former episcopal seat of Roussillon from 568 AD until the 17th century, Elne offers visitors a magnificent Romanesque cathedral from the 11th century and a cloister in white marble veined with blue.

Also a city of art, it is the birthplace of painter √âtienne Terrus (1857‚Äì1922), friend of Matisse, Maillol, and Montfreid.

Elne is also home to a powerful place of memory: the Swiss Maternity Hospital, bought by the city in 2005. This site honors the courage of Elisabeth Eidenbenz of the Swiss Aid to Children, who welcomed over 600 children there during the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

nature.title: üåø Nature, Beaches & Relaxation
nature.p1: Just minutes away, enjoy the Mediterranean beaches like Saint-Cyprien, Argel√®s-sur-Mer, or Collioure. Sunbathing, swimming, or water sports ‚Äì there‚Äôs something for everyone.
nature.p2: Nature lovers can explore the protected ponds of Canet-Saint-Nazaire or go hiking in the Alb√®res mountains, the first foothills of the Pyrenees.
nature.p3: For a quieter break, enjoy a bike ride through the orchards or along the Tech river path, between river and countryside.

culture.title: üé≠ Local Markets & Culture
culture.p1: All year round, stroll through the traditional Roussillon markets to discover local products, crafts, and Catalan specialties. The Elne market takes place every Friday morning from 8am to 1pm, right below our guest rooms.
culture.p2: In summer, enjoy traditional festivals, open-air concerts, street performances, and art exhibitions in the town or nearby villages.
culture.p3: Highlights include Visa pour l‚Äôimage in Perpignan in September, the Saint John‚Äôs Bonfires in June, and many summer village festivals just minutes from Elne.
culture.p4: Ask your host for more information about ongoing events during your stay!

sports.title: üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Outdoor Sports & Activities
sports.p1: Whether you're a thrill-seeker or a fan of peaceful strolls, the region offers a wide range of activities:
sports.p2: Tree climbing and artificial canyoning in Argel√®s-sur-Mer, natural canyoning in the nearby mountains, paragliding over the cliffs, hiking between sea and mountains, or kayaking and paddleboarding along the coast ‚Äì all unforgettable experiences.

villages.title: üåÑ Hilltop Villages & Heritage
villages.p1: Discover picturesque villages like Castelnou, Eus, or Collioure, ranked among the most beautiful in France.
villages.p2: Cobblestone streets, artisans, citadels, and breathtaking views await you at every turn ‚Äì a dive into Catalan authenticity and history.

conclusion.title: üåÖ A Region to Experience Fully
conclusion.text: Whether you seek nature, history, relaxation, or adventure, Elne and its surroundings will charm you. Enjoy a privileged setting between sea, mountains, and Catalan traditions.
